Your mind notices patterns, but sometimes misses the deeper connection behind them. You may react to information fast instead of slowing down to fully understand it. Small distractions can interrupt your reasoning flow, making conclusions feel unstable. You are not struggling; you are shaping your cognitive system.

What will you earn: Sharper mental clarity and cleaner reasoning.

Fun Fact: Talking out loud activates the same regions used in high-level reasoning.
